At SmartBear, we deliver the complete visibility developers need to make each release better than the last. Our award winning and industry favorite toolsTestComplete, Swagger, Cucumber, ReadyAPI, and Zephyrare trusted by over 16 million developers, testers, and software engineers at 32,000+ organizations – including world-renowned innovators like Adobe, JetBlue, FedEx, and Microsoft.Senior Frontend Engineer - ExplorerThe successful candidate will work from our Bangalore office in hybrid modelYou will help develop of one of the most perspective and newest SmartBear products

Tech stack: Javascript, Typescript, React 18About the role:As a Senior Frontend Engineer you will work on a completely new unannounced product in an international team, the first of its kind, to be used by developers around the world. As part of our team you will:  Ensure development JS in accordance with the software engineering and UX best practices, helping to define and champion development standards for the team.
Single Page Application development using React JS (Reflux, Redux) and other cutting edge frameworks & libraries.
Drive high engineering standards engaging in peer design and code reviews, grooming sessions, etc.
Create and maintain technical and support documentation
Ensure development is in accordance with the software engineering and UX best practices, helping to define and champion development standards for the team
Collaborate with teams of developers, testers, UX designers, product managers geographically spread across our different locations.We are looking for you if you have:7+ years of experience in software engineering in JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular).
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming, and writing maintainable code with good tests.
Knowledge of software testing.
Experience with PostgreSQL - schema / query design & implementation.
Experience with microservices architecture.Why you should join the SmartBear crew:You can grow your career at every level.
We invest in your success as well as the spaces where our teams come together to work, collaborate, and have fun.

We celebrate our differences in experiences, viewpoints, and identities because we know it leads to better outcomes.Did you know?Our main goal at SmartBear is to make our technology-driven world a better place.
